sourcesContent:
const theme = {
    colors: {
        main: "#ff870C", // Previously it was ff9933. New ff870c
        mainLight: "#fabf84",
        titleColor: "#2C3E50",
        titleColorLight: "#f7fbff",
        textColor: "#000000",
        backgroundColor: "#f5f5f5",
        whiteColor: "#fff",
        shadowOne: "rgba(0,0,0,0.15)",
        shadowTwo: "#eee",
        borderColor: "#efefef",
    },

    mediaQueries: {
        smallest: `only screen and (max-width: 25em)`,
        small: `only screen and (max-width: 37.5em)`,
        medium: `only screen and (max-width: 56em)`,
        large: `only screen and (max-width: 80em)`,
        largest: `only screen and (max-width: 90em)`,
    }
}

export default theme
